items.name: Chicken Tikka
items.description: Traditional appetizer of chicken breast pieces in a spicy marinade and cooked over charcoal.

items.name: Garlic Chicken Tikka
items.description: Tender pieces of chicken cooked in light spices with garlic and coriander.

items.name: Chicken 65
items.description: Chicken breast pieces marinated in special spice & then deep fried. Cooked with onions, peppers & hot garlic sauce.

items.name: Prawn Puri
items.description: Pan fried prawns lightly spiced & served on our special hot puri bread.

items.name: Shahi Lamb Chops
items.description: A spicy sensation. We coat lean chops in our spiced marinade and cook over charcoal until tender and slightly crisp.

items.name: Spicy grill Selection
items.description: A grilled selection consisting of chicken tikka, seekh kebab, lamb chops and garlic chicken tikka.

items.name: Meat Samosa
items.description: Desi Samosas stuffed with mincemeat, onion and spices.

items.name: Seekh Kebabs
items.description: Pounded lamb, blended with fresh coriander, ginger, green chilli and in-house spice, glazed to perfection in charcoal tandoor.

items.name: Anarari Jhinga
items.description: Large king prawns marinated in spices and then barbecued.

items.name: Chicken Wings
items.description: Marinated in yogurt and Indian spices, cooked in charcoal oven.

items.name: Hot Chilli Fish
items.description: Fish fillet cooked in a chilli sauce.

items.name: Akbari Paneer Tikka
items.description: Indian cottage cheese packed with fresh mint, spices and then barbecued.

items.name: Garlic Mushrooms
items.description: Whole fresh mushrooms coated in a special garlic mix, and cooked with cheese, peppers and onions.

items.name: Vegetarian Platter
items.description: A spicy selection consisting of onion bhaji, samosa, paneer tikka and garlic mushrooms.

items.name: Vegetable Samosa
items.description: Desi samosa stuffed with potatoes, green peas, cumin, ginger and green chilli.

items.name: Onion Bhaji
items.description: Fine julienne onion mixed in chef’s special spices and deep fried.

items.name: Tandoori Chilli Paneer
items.description: Chunks of paneer marinated in a punchy hot and sour tandoori masala.

items.name: Aloo Bonda
items.description: Potato filling coated with gram flour batter and deep fried to get crispy.

items.name: King Prawn Delight
items.description: King prawn marinated in yogurt, ginger and garlic. Cooked in a clay oven, mixed with a special thick tomato and onion sauce.

items.name: Huzari Tuwa Special
items.description: A traditional dish from Punjab consisting of chicken marinated in fresh spices, grilled in the tandoor with chef's special sauce. Served on a tawa.

items.name: Lamb Saag
items.description: Tender lamb cooked with fresh spinach and mustard green leaves followed by hint of Indian spices.

items.name: Rajasthani Desi Murg
items.description: An exquisite indulgence of chicken cooked with ginger, mushrooms and coriander.

items.name: Goan Fish Curry
items.description: An intriguing crossover for all lovers of fish. Fresh sea bass fillet tossed in a blend of green chillies, cumin, ginger paste, tamarind and coconut milk.

items.name: Chicken Mirch Masala
items.description: Fresh chicken cooked with tomato, onion and chef's special spices. Simply sensational.

items.name: Special Balti Mix
items.description: Spicy chicken, lamb and king prawns prepared together in the traditional way.

items.name: Hyderabadi Lamb
items.description: Lean lamb off the bone cooked slowly in a rich spicy sauce. One of the favourites for all Indians. A village dish from India.

items.name: Desi Butter Chicken
items.description: Tender chicken cooked in a creamy tomato sauce, infused with spicy flavours.

items.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
items.description: A true British invention. Tasty chicken marinated in yogurt with spices and herbs. Cooked in the tandoor and then mixed with ground almonds, pistachios and fresh cream. Finished with honey.

items.name: Sukha Fish Bhuna
items.description: Fresh cod pieces cooked with tomatoes, onions, garlic and chef's special spices.

items.name: Lamb Khumba
items.description: Fresh lean lamb, mushrooms and spring onions cooked with garlic, tomatoes and onion sauce. Finished with green coriander.

items.name: Mughal Shahi Chicken
items.description: A sweet collection of mild spices with cream and honey. Nuts are added to create a delicate flavour.

items.name: Karachi Chicken or Lamb
items.description: Traditional dishes made with a perfect fusion of fresh herbs and spices. Desi style base with fresh ginger, garlic and tomatoes, finished with fresh coriander.

items.name: Al Naseeb Dum Chicken
items.description: Chicken marinated in yogurt and garlic. Cooked in a clay oven, mixed with a special thick tomato and onion sauce.

items.name: Vindaloo
items.description: These dishes speak for themselves, a classic eastern Indian dish known world wide, cooked to various strength.

items.name: Madras
items.description: A highly flavoured spicy hot curry with a hint of fresh coriander.

items.name: Malabar
items.description: A south Indian famous curry cooked with chilli, coriander, mustard seeds, curry leaves and coconut.

items.name: Jalfrezi
items.description: Spicy sauce of diced onions. Diced capsicums and then garnished with juliennes of ginger and a sprinkle of fresh coriander.

items.name: Korma
items.description: Mixture of spices, including ground coriander and cumin, combined with yogurt.

items.name: Rogan Josh
items.description: Cooked in rich medium spicy sauce. A village dish from Kashmir.

items.name: Dhansak
items.description: Flavoured with spices including cumin, ginger and yellow lentil. It is mild, sweet and rich with just enough heat to satisfy most tastes.

items.name: Dopiaza
items.description: The name of an onion-based dish. It is prepared with many onions, both cooked in the spices and curry and as a garnish.

items.name: Bhuna
items.description: Accompanied by a thick sauce made with tomato, onion and red pepper. Commonly a hot curry as fresh green chilli is used without any use of cream or yoghurt.

items.name: Chicken Tikka
items.description: Marinated overnight in yogurt, ginger, masala and cooked in our coal fired oven.

items.name: Half Tandoori Chicken
items.description: Chicken on the bone, marinated overnight and cooked to order in our coal fired oven.

items.name: Garlic Chicken Tikka
items.description: Chicken marinated in yogurt, garlic light herbs and dollops of soft cheese.

items.name: Salmon Dill Tikka
items.description: Chunky fresh salmon marinated with dill, fennel and touch of mustard oil.

items.name: Tandoori Sea Bass
items.description: Fresh Sea Bass with light marinade, cooked in our clay oven.

items.name: Safari Meat Platter
items.description: A selection of chicken on the bone, chicken tikka, garlic tikka, lamb chops and seekh kebab.

items.name: Chicken Fillet Steak
items.description: Served with fried onions, mushrooms, chips and salad.

items.name: Sirloin Steak
items.description: 8oz Sirloin Steak cooked to choice, served with a black pepper sauce, fried onions, mushrooms, chips and salad.

items.name: Omelette (Chicken or Cheese)
items.description: Served with chips and salad.

items.name: Chicken
items.description: Basmati rice cooked with chef’s special herbs and spices. Served with sauce and salad.

items.name: King Prawns
items.description: Basmati rice cooked with chef’s special herbs and spices. Served with sauce and salad.

items.name: Lamb
items.description: Basmati rice cooked with chef’s special herbs and spices. Served with sauce and salad.

items.name: Vegetable

items.name: Set Meal A (Minimum 2 People)
items.description: Includes Poppadums and chutneys. Starters: Mix Starter Platter (Chicken Tikka, Seekh Kebab, Garlic Chicken and Onion Bhaji). Mains: Chicken Tikka Masala, Lamb Rogan Josh, Bombay Potatoes, Bread basket, Pulao Rice.

items.name: Set Meal B (Minimum 2 People)
items.description: Includes Poppadums and chutneys. Starters: Mix Starter Platter (Chicken Tikka, Fish Pakora, Onion Bhaji, and Lamb Chops). Mains: Butter Chicken, Lamb Saag, Sukha Fish Bhuna, Bombay Potato, Bread basket, Pulao Rice.

items.name: Penitino Pinot Grigio
items.description: South Africa. A lovely dry white with a fruity finish.

items.name: Pierre Lacasse Sauvignon Blanc
items.description: Pays d’Oc, France (vegetarian). Characterful, refreshing and vibrant with citrus, honey, nuts and elderflower. This is well-balanced and zesty.

items.name: Gold County Chardonnay
items.description: California (vegetarian). Easy-drinking and just off-dry with honeydew melon and pineapple, ripe pear and baked apple.

items.name: Willowglen Gewurz Riesling
items.description: Riverina, Australia (vegan). An intense aromatic wine, with scents of peach, musk and lemon zest. Generous sweet palate balanced by the crisp Riesling.

items.name: Gold County Cabernet Sauvignon
items.description: California (vegetarian). Light-bodied, soft, juicy and easy-drinking, with notes of sweet ripe strawberries.

items.name: Vinecrafter Merlot
items.description: Western Cape, South Africa. There is intense cranberries, crushed herbs on the nose of this wine, along with a hint of cinnamon and subtle oak on the palate. This is a smooth and juicy wine with a silky tannin structure and a lingering finish.

items.name: Despacito Malbec
items.description: Mendoza, Argentina (vegan). It presents a bright red colour with fresh aromas of plums and blackberries and a hint of spice. The palate is clean and smooth with enticing red and black berry fruit, perfectly balanced and a good finish.

items.name: Ramon Bilbao Crianza
items.description: Rioja, Spain. A lovely Crianza Rioja, with aromas of fresh dark fruit, such as blackberries and blackcurrants and hints of blackberry. It has a lovely ripeness and generous fruit character, whilst retaining good structure.

items.name: Rose San Giorgio Pinot Grigio
items.description: Veneto, Italy (vegetarian). Delicate, dry and fresh, this is light in colour with notes of pear, bubblegum and rosehip.

items.name: Gold County Zinfandel Blush
items.description: California (vegetarian). Med-sweet, lush red fruit, rhubarb and custard creams. Fun in a glass.

items.name: One 4 One Prosecco DOC
items.description: Veneto, Italy (vegan). A quality, aromatic sparkling wine. No need to share!

items.name: La Fornarina Prosecco DOC Extra Dry
items.description: Treviso, Italy. Delicate, slightly sweet and particularly fruity.

items.name: Henriot Brut Souverain NV Champagne
items.description: France. Straw-gold, bright and clear in appearance. A lovely bead in the glass forms a cortege of regular, delicate bubbles. On the nose, the Champagne offers magnificent, vivacious character. Citrus fruit aromas are followed by a cavalcade of floral bouquets, elderberry and vine blossom. Delicious brioche notes and the simplicity of lightly toasted bread and roasted almonds. Well balanced and harmonious on the palate, summoning flavours of brioche, together with crunchy cherries and the sun-kissed blush of white peach. Clean on the finish, with all the freshness of just-picked walnuts.
